meta.title: SQL to Java Entity and Mapper Generator
meta.description: Converts a MySQL table structure into Java entity classes and MyBatis Plus Mappers for use in Java projects.

conversationStarters: Let's convert your SQL table structure to Java entity classes and MyBatis Plus Mappers.
Please provide the SQL schema for your table, and I'll generate the Java code.
I can help you create Java entity classes and MyBatis Plus Mappers from your MySQL table.
Enter your SQL table structure, and I'll generate the corresponding Java code for you.
